text: <@U7SL518D6>and <@U26B530N6> - As much as I hate to admit this, I rebooted my PC and have since been able to use `hs create module` as expected.. :faceplam: - I will report back if it starts happening again, but I can't come up with any logical explanation for the odd behaviors.
Appreciate you letting us know. We were scratching our heads too. Must have been some kind of memory or permissions issue that fixed itself on reboot

Yeah, I wish I had some better answer. It was especially strange when it worked once in `cmd`. I am going to be championing our development team moving to local development, so I am super glad this isn't a hurdle. Glad to see the tooling (CLI, etc) is all open source!

Absolutely. If you see ways it can be improved file an issue on our GitHub repository, as well as feel free to make a PR. We want the CLI to be easy to use for new developers yet incredibly powerful when you need it.
